Returns: the current setting for overriding the cache mode Value is @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_DEFAULT_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_NORMAL_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ELSE_NETWORK_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_NO_CACHE_E@, or @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ONLY_E@
getCacheMode().Description: Gets the current setting for overriding the cache mode.

Parameters: int: the mode to use. One of @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_DEFAULT_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ELSE_NETWORK_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_NO_CACHE_E@ or @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ONLY_E@. The default value is @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_DEFAULT_E@. Value is @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_DEFAULT_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_NORMAL_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ELSE_NETWORK_E@, @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_NO_CACHE_E@, or @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#LOAD_CACHE_ONLY_E@
setCacheMode(int).Description: Overrides the way the cache is used, see @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#setCacheMode_E@.

getAllowFileAccess().Description: Gets whether Service Workers support file access.

getAllowContentAccess().Description: Gets whether Service Workers support content URL access.

setAllowFileAccess(boolean).Description: Enables or disables file access within Service Workers, see @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#setAllowFileAccess_E@.

Parameters: boolean: true means block network loads by the Service Workers
setBlockNetworkLoads(boolean).Description: Sets whether Service Workers should not load resources from the network, see @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#setBlockNetworkLoads_E@.

Returns: true if the Service Workers are not allowed to load any resources from the network
getBlockNetworkLoads().Description: Gets whether Service Workers are prohibited from loading any resources from the network.

setAllowContentAccess(boolean).Description: Enables or disables content URL access from Service Workers, see @B_android#webkit#WebSettings#setAllowContentAccess_E@.

ClassDesc: Manages settings state for all Service Workers. These settings are not tied to the lifetime of any WebView because service workers can outlive WebView instances. The settings are similar to @B_android#webkit#WebSettings_E@ but only settings relevant to Service Workers are supported.
